title: I Can’t Wait For Nijigaku’s Live! Part 1
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Our live is almost here! I’m so pumped up!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Me too, Setsuna! Lanzhu is raring to go already~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>The live is on the weekend, you two~. If you keep up that tension, you’ll get tired by then, you know? Just relax like me~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>You’re right, Kanata-san, but I can’t stop this feeling~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>We know we need to calm down, but it’s sooo hard~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Then, let’s think about what we want to eat in Osaka~. Kanata wants some Udon~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I definitely need to try the takoyaki and okonomiyaki.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu is interested in something called kushiage.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>There must be more, right? Come on, focus on it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Food that I want to eat in Osaka.... Food that I want to eat....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Osaka’s meat.... Osaka’s meat....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
